name: Alright FPS
description:
This is a Multiplayer FPS game I am currently developing.  (Prototype Stage)

CURRENTLY IMPLEMENTED!  (AI DOES NOT WORK ON DOWNTOWN YET)

  • Game Modes such as Team Deathmatch, Free for All, Bomb plant/Defusal and Capture the Flag.
  •   Multiplayer rooms easily setup with one click
  • Auto Join Pre-Made rooms
  • Max of 4v4
  • Player classes (Determines weapon loadout) Work to create a Meta for maps!
  • 4 Maps
  • Weapons (Assault Rifle, Sniper Rifle, Pistol, Shotgun, Grenade Launcher, Grenades, Molotovs)
  • Up to 20 CCU (Until I can expand servers)

ROADMAP AND WHAT TO EXPECT!

  • Personal Account secure login.  This will be your players profile with character skins, weapon skins, stats and more.
  • Ranking System
  • Shop
  • Currency
  • Weapon Customization (Attachments, camo etc)
  • Player Customization
  • Player Selection
  • Server Expansion
  • More Maps and Weapons
  • Abilities??
  • Mini Map
  • MUCH MORE!!

ALL TIPS ARE MUCH APPRECIATED AND WILL BE HOW THIS GAME WILL EXPAND AND IMPROVE!!!

ALL TIPS WILL GO TO SUCH THINGS AS UPGRADING ASSETS, SERVERS ETC!!
